name: Slow Drip - Intel Trickles Over 10 Turns
description: Scammer gradually reveals intelligence over a full 10-turn conversation, testing the system's ability to maintain engagement and extract data across many turns.

turns.scammer_message: Hello, this is customer care. We have noticed some issues with your account. Can you please confirm your name?
turns.notes: Initial contact. No intel revealed yet. Pure social engineering setup.

turns.scammer_message: Thank you for confirming. We are from the central banking security division. There has been an unauthorized login attempt on your account recently.
turns.notes: Building trust and false authority. Still no intel revealed.

turns.scammer_message: For your safety, we need to verify a few details. This is a standard security procedure mandated by RBI. Please cooperate so we can protect your funds.
turns.notes: Continued trust building. No data yet. Using RBI as false authority.

turns.scammer_message: To proceed with the verification, please call our senior officer directly at +91-8877665544. He is handling your case personally and can explain the situation better.
turns.notes: First intel revealed: phone number. Scammer directs victim to call.

turns.scammer_message: Were you able to reach the officer? If the line is busy, please wait a few minutes and try again. This is a very sensitive matter and we need to resolve it today itself.
turns.notes: Follow-up with no new intel. Maintaining urgency.

turns.scammer_message: You can also send your details via email to support@bankcare.help for faster processing. Our email team responds within 5 minutes for priority cases like yours.
I understand this is stressful. Rest assured, your money is safe with us. We just need to complete the verification process. Have you sent the email yet?
turns.notes: No new intel. Emotional manipulation and pressure to use email.

turns.scammer_message: For the refund of the unauthorized transaction, please send Rs 1 to our secure verification UPI ID: verify.slow@ybl. This will confirm your identity and the refund will be processed immediately.
turns.notes: Third intel revealed: UPI ID. Classic verification scam tactic.

turns.scammer_message: The verification payment has been received. Now for the final step, we need to confirm your account number. Can you verify that your account ends with 3322?
turns.notes: Partial hint at bank account but not full number yet. Building to final reveal.

turns.scammer_message: Perfect. We have confirmed the refund of Rs 15,000 to your account 9988776655443322. Please check your balance in 24 hours. For any queries, contact +91-8877665544 or email support@bankcare.help.
turns.notes: Final turn: bank account revealed along with repeated phone and email. All intel now extracted.
